    public class CustomFormCheckBox
extends com.vaadin.ui.OptionGroup

    Custom checkbox implementation based on OptionGroup rather than CheckBox so that it works with Vaadin's FormLayout properly. If the latter is used, captions are displayed to the right of the checkbox in the form - we want it to be aligned with the rest of the form, on the left side.

    At the present time, it only supports single select mode, but can easily be made to support multi-select mode too.

    Author:
    SkyCrawl
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
